dialog1.title: Oops!
dialog1.content: Did you just click the button?

intro.dialog2: You must have sent all the Cryptopunks back to ancient Japan.
intro.dialog3: Get on our first-ever blockchain time machine and meet the Katana N' Samurai!

news1.heading:
Aim to Record the Historical Milestone of
 Blockchain in Ukiyo-e style.

news2.heading:
Creating a SamuraiVerse where
 Samurai can Change Clothes and
 Join different Shogunates.

news3.heading:
Even Purchasing, Forging, Designing Katana to
 Join the Battle between Shogunates.

story.title: Katana N' Samurai is composed of elements with different rarity and power values.
story.subtitle: Our Samurai can change clothes, carry Katana, and get ready to fight for their Shogunate in our KNS GAME.

cards.heading: /images/homepage-card-title-hatamoto.png
cards.content: “Only Samurai Aliens, Apes, and Zombies like us can be the highest-ranking samurai. We direct service to the Shogunate and guard the flag in the fight.”

cards.heading: /images/homepage-card-title-kashira.png
cards.content: “We are Samurai trusted by Hatamoto. Carrying out missions, coordinating units composed of Doshin officials is our duty. Fight for the honor and win respect!”

cards.heading: /images/homepage-card-title-doshin.png
cards.content: “All the chonin in the Shogunate are under our protection. Crime? Murder? Theft? No worries, here we are.”

cards.heading: /images/homepage-card-title-komono.png
cards.content: “Be as the youngest Samurai, we're campaigning and full of energy. When not at war, we assist Doshin to do their daily work.”

sold.content: Every 1,000 SOLD, we will invite those Samurai who come to this parallel universe before then, and airdrop Ukiyo-e woodblock chain history work on Discord.
Let's GET KATANA for our Samurai! We will invite all of the Samurai to join the designing.
Yeehaw! Katana N' Samurai will develop into a GAME!

description.title: Wars break out from time to time. Check out who’s controlling the world.
description.subtitle:
“Honor may not win power, but it wins respect. And respect earns power.”
Fight for your respective Shogunate!

about.title: Btw, Katana N’ Samurai is programmatically transported to Japan and lives on the Ethereum blockchain.
about.subtitle: Katana N’ Samurai is a collection of 10,000 unique digital samurai. We initiated the blockchain time machine and sent all the Cryptopunks back to ancient Japan. It’s not the year 2021, it’s the year 1700. In this parallel universe, Samurai belong to different Shogunate, carry different levels of power, with their legends. Ukiyo-e is the way we picture our Katana N’ Samurai. Also, we want to record the history of the blockchain world. To make here a sustainable and interactive community, Samurai community will eventually run by a DAO. People who join Samuraiverse will be involved in determining the direction of this project, including designing Katana with the team. Welcome to Samuraiverse! Join our Discord and follow our Twitter to be part of our community!

article.title:
The elements of your 
Samurai may be composed of:
article.content:
Scenery: Four seasons of Fuji, Hokkaido, Kyoto, Tokyo, Osaka

Clothes: Cherry blossom, Checkered, Chrysanthemum, Cross, Star-print (size S, M, L, XL)

Race: Human, Zombie, Ape, Alien

Eyes: Confused eyes, Red eyes, Smiley eyes, Geisha eyes, Alien eyes

Hats and hairstyles: Bandana, Bamboo hat, Purple Cap, Green cap, Beanie, Hoodie, Knitted cap, Mohawk Hairstyle, Long hair, Big beard

Katana: Will be designed with our community after 40% of our samurai sold

Accessories: Ethereum earring, Tongue out, Pipe, 3D Glasses, VR, Nerd Glasses, Glasses with chain

Persona: it might be a quote, an accomplishment, or a secret that no one else knows


(Note that there are more additional surprises to be unlocked!)
